name: Drawback
description:
Top-down Cooperative Action RPG for up to 3 players

Choose from 3 classes and fight for survival in arena-based combat

Gain powerful traits as you level,  but beware of their downsides

Notes

This game uses steam for multiplayer. Make sure you have it started up before launching (not required for single player)

Controls

Hold right click to move

Press "Q W E Spacebar" to use your abilities
Misc

This game was made for the 2019 Spring UE4jam (Marketplace Takeover). The theme of the GameJam was: The Other Side of the Coin

The game relies on the Gameplay Ability System (comes with UE4) and uses the following assets:

  • AdvancedCelShaderLite (Skull)
  • AdvancedMagicFX13 (Kakky)
  • HumanVocalizations (Gamemaster Audio)
  • Supergrid Starter pack (ZeOrb)
  • MedievalFantasyAudioBundle (Evil Mind)
  • ModularRPGHeroesPolyart (Dungeon Mason)
  • EasyEnemyPack (Quaternius)
